titles: A proclamation of the General Convention of Ireland, for proclaiming His Sacred Royal Majesty King Charles the Second
author: Ireland. General Convention.
publisher: Dublin printed by William Bladen, and re-printed at London by Daniel Pakeman ...,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
"May the 14. 1660. Ordered by the General Convention of Ireland, that this proclamation be forthwith printed and published. Ma. Barry clerk of the General Convention of Ireland."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London Library.
